QuestData.Title: Trouble at Greystone Keep
QuestData.Description:
A friend of mine, a fellow military courier, had a job at Greystone Keep. The fort lies just outside of Boralus, so I would've expected him to be back by now.
I have another job lined up, so could you go check out the fort for me? I'm probably just being paranoid.
QuestData.RewardText: A courier? I think we lost him in the coup.
